title: The Incredible Rescues
description: The Incredible Rescues by Ed Dunlop is the third book in the Young Refugees Series. This historical fiction story details the exciting adventures of fourteen-year-old Hans and his younger sister, Gretchen, in numerous close calls with Nazi soldiers. Hans and Gretchen assist the Swedish diplomat Raoul Wallenberg by delivering food, messages, and hope to the many Jewish people in various locations around the city of Budapest. Throughout the pages of this book, they assist Mr. Wallenberg in evacuating many Jewish people from Hungary during the closing days of World War II. Trust in the Lord is the focus of this Christian fiction book. Get the whole  Escape to Liechtenstein and The Search for the Silver Eagle.
author: Ed Dunlop
